1.content:
One day you sit by yourself re-watching all the Hunger Games movies in order because you were bored. You fall asleep durring the marathon and when you wake up, you notice you've been shrunk to half an inch tall and somehow ended up in the demention that the Hunger Games is based in. When suddenly you notice exactly where you are in this demention!

Where are you?
1.title: The Beginning...

choices: In the middle of the games...
1555.title: More choices

info.brief_description: You've shrunk and ended up in the movies of the Hunger Games. How will you survive?
info.description:
One day you sit by yourself re-watching all the Hunger Games movies in order because you were bored. You fall asleep durring the marathon and when you wake up, you notice you've been shrunk to half an inch tall and somehow ended up in the demention that the Hunger Games is based in. When suddenly you notice exactly where you are in this demention!

Rules:
No killing the tiny, No Ending the story, No 1 line chapters (unless I approved of it), NO MALE INTERACTION (except the tiny), you are yourself so use 3rd person pov u less using quotes to show your speaking and use ( ) to show that your thinking to yourself.

More rules will be added as needed.

**I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO EDIT/REMOVE ANY CHAPTERS ADDED IF I BELIEVE ITS NEEDED!!!!!**
